    Govlov Podcast

    07 Sep 2018
    Author: ewd
    		 Tags: shrink smart, govlov, podcast

    My recent work on data-driven rural sociology was featured today on the GovLov Podcast. Thanks to Ben Kittelson for taking the time to talk with us!

    You can read more about what our team, lead by Professor Kimberley Zarecor has accomplished at the NSF project site for Smart and Connected Communities.
